FuncDef: This command assigns an AA ISA configured in the specified slot to this application assurance group. The backup module provides the application assurance group with warm redundancy when the primary module in the group is configured. Primary and backup modules have equal operational status and when both module are coming up, the ones that becomes operational first becomes the active module. A module can serve as a backup for multiple AA ISA cards but only one can fail to it at one time.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the card/slot identifying a provisioned module to be used as a backup module.
